title: Bamboo
content: A logo typeface I created for a Nightclub in Bath , U.K. ![bamboo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416074436im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/785.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
Because of the shapes, this might be difficult to pull off over an entire alphabet. Perhaps it could work as a script. I'd be curious to see how you did it if you do do it. ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416074436im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) The football counters make me want to see the word 'football' done like this.   
   
bj

yes I am certain this would be hard to complete as a whole typeface. I will not attempt this although I would welcome someone to take this and go with it, as long as I could get a copy of the final product.
